title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models with 5 lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat endpoint with LangChain primitives.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat-like ChatGPT) that talks to a local Ollama instance; no data leaves your box.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick pulls, prompts and model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Local GitHub-Copilot clone: VS-Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chat UI with Ollama backend; supports threads, system prompts, markdown rendering.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic client with blocks for streaming chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama; async HTTP client with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and compose files for running Ollama in Docker/K8s.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart that deploys Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Official docs listing community SDKs for Go, Rust, Swift, Dart, C# and more.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Lightweight Node CLI that wraps ollama-js to give ChatGPT-style conversation sessions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that pipes selected notes through any Ollama model for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain for local Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers prompts via Ollama; supports slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS with CUDA optional.
